H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3147.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, the judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} who is also known as {L:Jerubbaal<SDBH:יְרֻבַּעַל>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► known for the fable that he told about the inhabitants of {L:Shechem<SDBH:שְׁכֶם>}

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H6492.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Remaliah<SDBH:רְמַלְיָהוּ>}; ► king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; contemporary of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}, king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H5128.def: = process by which objects move up and down or sideways

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H3293.def: = a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H5357.def: = a narrow opening or long, narrow crack in a rock; ≈ regarded as a suitable place for hiding

H8181.def: = the fine thread-like strands growing from the skin of humans and certain animals

H5697.def: = female young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as sacrifice

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H2461.def: = white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well-being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H2529.def: = coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into {L:cheese<SDBH:חָרִיץ>} or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

H3498.def: = state in which humans, animals, or objects remain in a certain place after part of the original quantity has been located elsewhere

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1706.def: = sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H8068.def: = a legendary rock or mineral, known for its hardness; ≈ associated with an inflexible mind

H7898.def: = small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H2671.def: = pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8068.def: = a legendary rock or mineral, known for its hardness; ≈ associated with an inflexible mind

H7898.def: = small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

H3374.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H8068.def: = a legendary rock or mineral, known for its hardness; ≈ associated with an inflexible mind

H7898.def: = small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4576.def: = flat metal blade, 10-20 centimeters wide, mounted on a wooden handle with the blade at a right angle to the handle; ► used for loosening the soil and weeding

H7716.def: = an individual member of a group of {L:sheep<SDBH:כֶּבֶשׂ>} and {L:goats<SDBH:עֵז>} traveling and feeding together

H4823.def: = action by which humans or animals tread heavily and noisily on people, plants, or objects; ► usually with the purpose of killing, destroying, desecrating, and/or humiliating
